{{Wired embedded system |brand=VIA |model=APC |revision=Rock |asin= |price=59 |est_release_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability=now |type=single-board computer |fcc_id= |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=WonderMedia |cpu1_model=WM8950 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores= |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model= |ram1=512 MiB |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CB128M16BP-CG |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, MicroSD Card slot |expansion_usb_num=3 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, |serial=yes,, |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=IC+ |eth_chip2_model=IP101A |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=HDMI, VGA, Audio in/out, |stock_boot= |stock_os=Android;2.3; |tp_firmware= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth= }} :[http://apc.io/products/8750a/ Product page] {{•}} [http://apc.io/8750-manual/ Manual] {{•}} [https://3a3efi1ddzlp2a1fxkq15lp1-wpengine.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/gallery/apc-rock/130110_012.jpg PCB image]
*[https://github.com/apc-io/apc-8750 Kernel & Bootloader source] {{see also|WonderMedia}}
===Technical Details=== *Model: VIA APC Rock *Software: Android 2.3 *Chip: VIA ARM Cortex-A9 @1000Mhz Processor *Memory: RAM: 512MB (DDR3), Flash: 4GB (NAND) *Graphics: Built-in 2D/3D Graphic (720p) *Input and Output: HDMI, VGA, Audio out/Mic in :USB: 2x USB 2.0, microUSB (OTG), microSD Card slot *Network: 1x 10/100 Ethernet *Debug: 20-pin ARM JTAG header *Expansion: Extra GPIO, SPI, I2C *Size: 170 x 85 mm (W x H) :Neo ITX Standard
===See also=== *https://apc.io/specifications/ *[[VIA APC Paper]] *[[VIA APC Rock]] *[[VIA APC 8750]]
